## For alien visitors

*Welcome!*

We're thrilled that you're coming to visit Trang's beautiful country!
Sincerely!

### Events

You're invited to two official events,
both in the peninsular city of Vũng Tàu where one can watch both sunrise and sunset over the ocean.
First is the engagement ceremony on December 24, called Đám Hỏi,
where the groom's family & friends present dowric offerings to the bride's family
(at their residence).
Second is the wedding reception at the Palace Hotel on December 26.

### Lodging

If you would like to stay at the 4-star [Palace Hotel](https://goo.gl/maps/mbVEmU1ok68hXiRw7),
you can book via Priceline, Booking.com, Expedia, etc.
The nightly rate is around $50 including breakfast.

<aside>
The hotel finds it too logistically challenging to offer any group discount.
</aside>

There are a few AirBnB options but they can be a little further away from city center.
We're currently looking at [this space](https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/48702865)
that is right in the center and can accommodate up to 12 people.
Let us know if you're interested!

### Việt Nam visa

Foreign visitors will need a [tourist visa](https://vietnamembassy-usa.org/consular/visa-application-process).
We can provide you with the contact details for Trang's father,
if the visa requires a sponsor or destination address.
We will update this section with additional insights soon.

### Trang & Daniel's itinerary 

We will be in Viet Nam from Nov 27 to Dec 28, 2022.
Let us know when you arrive, so Trang can be your guide for a few days!

On the way back to the states, Daniel, Trang, & brother Joshua have booked the following flights
available as a reward booking for 44k United MileagePlus miles & $96.07 per head:

- Wed, Dec 28, 2022.  
  SQ 185 SGN at 7:50 pm to SIN at 10:55 pm
- SQ 308 SIN at 9:00 am to LHR at 3:20 pm
- UA 25 LHR at 5:00 pm to BOS at 7:50 pm
